name: Cabo Fish Taco
description: A favorite of students here on campus they are known for there, well, fish tacos. It is fairly close to campus and a good place to hangout and get tacos and other mexican food if you would like

name: 622 North
description: A restaurant/bar with a nice formalish dining area attached to a bar. They serve a variety of food from charcuterie boards to burgers and fries. This place is a personal favorite for me and is a place to go for special occasions and late night drinks

name: Gillie's
description: This place is popular for breakfast and is situated close to campus. This is a good place for vegetarian cuisine but it also has seafood items on the menu. It can get quite busy sometimes.

name: Top of the Stairs
description: One of the closest bars to campus that still offers a nice atmosphere even if you cannot drink. They serve good American food such as BBQ and tater tots. This is also a place many tourists go to to take pictures with a neon light flag outside.

name: Benny Marzano's
description: Benny Marzanos is known for serving some of the largest pizza slices around. This place is the original location of a pizza restaurant chain that stays open very late for primarily student customers. It is a must have if you are a student here.

name: PK's Bar and Grill
description: Nice restaurant a little off campus with options like soup, sandwiches/burgers, wings, salad, and pizza. This is a nice place to bring a group of people too for food that can come out relatively quick.

name: Spicity
description: Nicer restaurant for asian food off campus. It's a great place to try with a nice variety of food and drinks to try and enjoy
